decisions.description: FOR NEW WEBFORMS: Created as Drupal webforms do not work with Auto-Response Rules of the web-to-lead.
decisions.name: Lead_Auto_response_for_webforms_for_new_website_with_Drupal_AssistNow
decisions.label: Lead: Auto response for webforms (for new website with Drupal, AssistNow)

rules.name: Lead_Auto_response_for_webforms_for_new_website_with_Drupal_AssistNow_Condition
rules.label: Lead: Auto response for webforms (for new website with Drupal, AssistNow) Condition

decisions.description: Webform response except Project Information Form - Customer that is sent from Autopilot
decisions.name: Lead_Auto_response_for_webforms_for_new_website_with_Drupal_generic
decisions.label: Lead: Auto response for webforms (for new website with Drupal, generic)

rules.name: Lead_Auto_response_for_webforms_for_new_website_with_Drupal_generic_Condition
rules.conditionLogic: ((1 OR 2 OR 3 OR (4 AND (5 OR 6)) ) AND 7 AND 8)
rules.label: Lead: Auto response for webforms (for new website with Drupal, generic) Condition

decisions.description: When Lead is created via web2lead, inform sales admin team and assigned account managers.
decisions.name: Lead_inform_about_web2lead_action_PCN_APAC
decisions.label: Lead: inform about web2lead action, PCN (APAC)

rules.name: Lead_inform_about_web2lead_action_PCN_APAC_Condition
rules.conditionLogic: ( (5 OR 6 OR 7 OR 8 OR 9 OR 10 ) AND (1 OR (2 AND 3)) ) AND 4
rules.label: Lead: inform about web2lead action, PCN (APAC) Condition

decisions.description: Temporary alert to notify Giovanni Solito and thingstream about new lead. It is for product services requests.
decisions.name: Lead_Notify_gsol_about_new_leads
decisions.label: Lead: Notify gsol about new leads

rules.name: Lead_Notify_gsol_about_new_leads_Condition
rules.label: Lead: Notify gsol about new leads Condition

decisions.description: When Lead is created via web2lead, inform sales admin team and assigned account managers.
decisions.name: Lead_online_shop_send_email_alert_APAC
decisions.label: Lead / online shop: send email alert (APAC)

rules.name: Lead_online_shop_send_email_alert_APAC_Condition
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND 2 AND 9 AND ( 3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 6 OR 7 OR 8) AND 10
rules.label: Lead / online shop: send email alert (APAC) Condition

decisions.description: When Lead is created via web2lead, inform sales admin team and assigned account managers.
decisions.name: Lead_PCN_subscription_send_email_alert_Americas
decisions.label: Lead / PCN subscription: send email alert (Americas)

decisions.description: When Lead is created via web2lead, inform sales admin team and assigned account managers.
decisions.name: Lead_PCN_subscription_send_email_alert_EMEA
decisions.label: Lead / PCN subscription: send email alert (EMEA)

rules.name: Lead_PCN_subscription_send_email_alert_EMEA_Condition
rules.label: Lead / PCN subscription: send email alert (EMEA) Condition

decisions.description: When Lead is created via web2lead, inform sales admin team.
decisions.name: Lead_project_form_send_email_alert_Americas
decisions.label: Lead / project form: send email alert (Americas)

rules.name: Lead_project_form_send_email_alert_Americas_Condition
rules.conditionLogic: (2 AND ( (1 OR 7 OR 8 ) OR (3 AND (4 OR 9 ) )) AND 5 ) AND 6
rules.label: Lead / project form: send email alert (Americas) Condition

decisions.description: When Lead Source is "Project Form - Customer", "NB-IoT Project Form", "Event registration (aloom)" or "Marketing Automation", inform Lead Owner
decisions.name: Lead_project_form_send_email_alert_EMEA
decisions.label: Lead / project form: send email alert (EMEA)

rules.name: Lead_project_form_send_email_alert_EMEA_Condition
rules.conditionLogic: ( ( (1 AND 2 AND (3 OR (4 AND 5) OR (4 AND 6) OR (4 AND 8) OR 7) AND 9) OR (10 AND (7 OR 8)) ) AND 11)
rules.label: Lead / project form: send email alert (EMEA) Condition
